product_name: The North Face Venesborg Triclimate Jacket - Men's
long_description: You'll look forward to your cold-weather commute when you wear The North Face Venesborg Triclimate jacket. This versatile jacket sports a removable down-filled liner jacket and multiple pockets. The North Face Venesborg Triclimate jacket features 2 jackets that can be worn 3 ways. Cotton/polyester/wool-blend jacket features an adjustable, removable hood and snap placket over the center-front zipper. Down liner jacket is insulated with 700-fill-power down; polyester exterior has a Durable Water Repellent finish to deflect light snow and rain when the liner is worn alone. Down liner jacket offers two zippered hand pockets; adjustable drawcord at hem. Outer jacket has pockets galore: snap chest pocket; internal Napoleon media pocket with cord guide; metro pocket; media tablet pocket; dual-entry compartment zip hand pockets.
short_description: You'll look forward to your cold-weather commute when you wear The North Face Venesborg Triclimate jacket. This versatile jacket sports a removable down-filled liner jacket and multiple pockets.
